body_html:
@cancan101 I see what you're saying, and I agree there seems to be a bug here.

WRT the details, I don't think calling _ImageDimensions(image, static_only=True) sounds right, since the sizes are not actually statically known. Instead I think we want to treat the depth separately from the width and height, but I'm not sure what the right fix is.

@gaohuazuo I believe you wrote the current version in PR #2737 - can you comment on whether you agree there's a problem here, and how we might fix things?

Thanks all!
